Diego Armando Maradona

The greatest football player of all time

Diego Maradone with the world cup, Mexico 1986, after defeading West Germany 3:2

Major Events in Diego's Life

  • 1960 - Born in Lanus, Argentina
  • 1968 - Became a staple of Los Cebollitas, the junior team of Buenos Aires's Argentinos Juniors
  • 1976 - Made his professional debut for Argentinos Juniors, 10 days before his 16th birthday, vs. Talleres de Córdoba
  • 1979 - Won the FIFA wold touth championship
  • 1981 - Signed a contract with Boca Juniors
  • 1982 - Transferred to Barcelona in Spain for a then world record fee of £5 million ($7.6 million)
  • 1984 - Transferred to Napoli in Italy's Serie A for another world record fee, £6.9 million ($10.48 million)
  • 1986 - Won with Argentina national team the Mexico 1986 World Cup
  • 1986-1987 - Won with Napoli their first ever Serie A Italian Championship
  • 1987 - Won with Napoli the Coppa Italia
  • 1989 - Won with Napoli UEFA Cup
  • 1989-1990 - Won with Napoli their second league title
  • 1990 - Won with Napoli the Italian Supercup
  • 1990 - Lost with Argentina to West Germany in Italy 1990 World Cup
  • 1990 - Ban for 15 month for failing a drug test for cocaine
  • 1992 - Signed for Sevilla
  • 1993 - Played for Newell's Old Boys
  • 1995 - Returned to Boca Juniors for a two-year stint
  • 2020 - Died on 25 November at Dique Lujan, Argentina

If you have time, you should read more about this amazing player on his Wikipedia entry.
